definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: If you make the company better and better, profits will naturally follow.
sentences.chinese: 公司越做越好，利潤自然隨之而來。

sentences.english: My head was rising up, and my body was following it.
sentences.chinese: 我擡起頭，身體也隨之立起。

sentences.english: With time the pinna becomes shrivelled.
They don't scramble against careerists for interest and power.
sentences.chinese: 野心家在那兒爭權奪利，他們不會隨之起舞。

sentences.english: Corruption is another word for it. One of my closest friends in India.
sentences.chinese: 腐敗也會隨之而來，我來自印度的最好的朋友之一。

sentences.english: In his anger he hit the man, and a fight ensued.
sentences.chinese: 他在憤怒之下打了那人，一場爭鬥將隨之而起。

sentences.english: The summer season is upon us and with it comes bathing suit season.
sentences.chinese: 夏季正在逼近，隨之而來的也是泳衣季節。

sentences.english: He took a breath to clear away the cobwebs of the night as the raven flapped away.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了口氣吹走昨夜的蜘蛛網，烏鴉隨之撲翅飛開。

sentences.english: But if we work viscosity, all is changed.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們運作黏性，一切都隨之改變。

sentences.english: She smiled and some of her natural reserve melted .
sentences.chinese: 她微微一笑，那天生的矜持也隨之消失。

sentences.english: The warming of the Earth and the con- sequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.chinese: 地球變暖以及隨之而來的氣候變化影響着我們所有人。

sentences.english: Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it.
sentences.chinese: 不要以惡小而開門，因爲大惡往往會隨之而來。

sentences.english: As version information is updated so does the knowledge for the data store. Providers use replica knowledge to
sentences.chinese: 當版本信息更新時，用於數據存儲的知識也隨之更新。

sentences.english: Coupled with the rapid development of information technology, piracy emergences everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 信息業的高速發展，隨之而來的是盜版的肆意氾濫。

sentences.english: Drop your knees down to the right without allowing your body to follow.
sentences.chinese: 將雙膝向右側放下，同時身體上部不能隨之右轉。

sentences.english: A cause of action has  accrued when the right to sue has become vested.
sentences.chinese: 起訴的理由在控告權被賦予後隨之存在。

definition: to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
